translated: The Saá¹ƒgha's Preceptor wishes to enter nirvÄá¹‡a and speaks the sÅ«tra of the six perfections
I announce to the good men and good women in JambudvÄ«pa: I have been born in JambudvÄ«pa
as a father of great compassion, teaching and transforming sentient beings, cycling through the world, for now countless
kalpas, dividing my body into myriad koá¹­Ä«s.
I save and deliver sentient beings.
Seeing that the sentient beings in JambudvÄ«pa create much evil karma,
they do not believe in the Buddha's teachings.
Those who engage in evil deeds are many.
I cannot bear to see this.
My body will then enter nirvÄá¹‡a.
The relics and images will be spread throughout JambudvÄ«pa,
guiding and transforming sentient beings.
In the future, when the world is filled with the true Dharma of the Semblance Dharma,
I and Maitreya, the Honored Buddha, will be born at the same time.
We will sit together in the city of transformation,
saving and delivering those with wholesome affinities.
The original dwelling place
is in the Eastern Sea.
This is the karmic affinity for the Pure Land in the past and present lives.
Sentient beings are stubborn and foolish, difficult to transform.
They do not believe in the Buddha's teachings.
And commit many evil deeds.
I will leave my original place and go to the West to teach and transform sentient beings.
Known as Shakyamuni Buddha.
The Eastern country will then be invaded by five hundred poisonous dragons and become a great ocean.
All sentient beings will sink in the ocean.
Transforming into alligators, crocodiles, fish, and turtles.
After my passing, I will be reborn in Jambudvipa from the Hu country in the West.
To save and deliver through wholesome causes.
The seeds of Buddha-nature.
I see the sentient beings of Jambudvipa.
Everywhere in the realm, they are fierce and evil.
They devour each other.
They cannot be taught and transformed.
I will now enter nirvana.
The relics, the original bones, wish to remain in Sishui in the future.
If there are good men and good women.
With a compassionate mind, filial and obedient.
Respecting my image, fasting and eating vegetarian food.
Recalling my name.
Such people are scattered throughout Jambudvipa.
I pity the evil world, where the power of weapons competes and arises.
All kinds of evil afflictions will not be able to control the body.
I will later be born in my homeland with the Venerable Buddha Maitreya.
My feet will tread on the dried-up seawater.
Thus, I will cause the eight groups of sages, including the devas and nÄgas, to build a transformation city in the center of the Eastern Sea.
Using gold and silver for the walls,
lapis lazuli for the ground,
and the seven treasures for the palace.
I will later arrive in JambudvÄ«pa.
And spread the Buddha's teachings.
Only transmitting this sÅ«tra.
Teaching and transforming wholesome causes.
The disciples of the six pÄramitÄs will return to me.
The transformation city will be spared in JambudvÄ«pa.
Those who experience the suffering and difficulties will all attain peace and security.
Clothing and food will naturally appear.
Long enjoying supreme bliss.
The weak waters separate the heavenly demons and non-Buddhists.
They will not come to cause harm.

I will deliver six kinds of people - the first to be delivered are those who are filial to their parents and respectful towards the Three Jewels; the second to be delivered are those who do not kill living beings;
Not drinking alcohol or eating meat - the fourth level.
With an impartial and kind heart, not stealing - the fifth level.
Practicing austerities.
Delighting in building bridges and other meritorious deeds - the sixth level.
Having compassion for the poor and sick.
Giving away clothing and food.
Extensively aiding those who are destitute.
Such good people who practice the six perfections,
I will first have a hundred children lead them onto a precious ship and carry them across the weak waters to prevent them from drowning and allow them to enter the transformed city.
If they are not people who practice the six perfections of mine,
when they see this sutra of mine, they will not believe or accept it in their hearts and will slander the true Dharma.
Know that these people, due to the roots of offenses from their past lives, will experience evil retribution in their bodies.
They may encounter thieves, soldiers, or epidemics and die.
They may be burned or swept away by water or fire.
They may be struck by a sudden illness, or fall into prison due to official matters.
Unwholesome beings will all experience immeasurable suffering and distress.
After death, they will enter hell.
There will be no chance of escape.
Will not return to the human realm for ten thousand kalpas.
Good men and good women.
Write out this sutra.
Resolve to uphold it.
If you encounter the waters of the kalpa, the fires of the kalpa, black winds, or heavenly darkness.
I will therefore illuminate you with immeasurable light.
Causes and conditions will come together in the Buddha's land.
Return together to the transformed city.
All will attain liberation.
Namo Sangha, Namo Sanghachincha, Saha. Datta TathÄgata, Oá¹ƒ, Balagupta, SvÄhÄ. Sangha He-shang Sutra
